original_text: All his officers and his personal guards, the Kerethites and Pelethites, went on past him. There were also 600 men who had come with him from Gath. All these people were leaving Jerusalem with the king.
korean_text: 그의 모든 신하들이 그의 곁으로 지나가고 모든 그렛 사람과 모든 블렛 사람과 및 왕을 따라 가드에서 온 모든 가드 사람 육백 명이 왕 앞으로 행진하니라

sentences.original_text: All his officers and his personal guards
who had come with him from Gath
All these people were leaving Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 이 모든 사람들이 예루살렘을 떠나고 있었다
